name: Don't TROLL and be Vaccinated
description:
Based on my experience with the vaccination, in this game, we simulate (more or less) the vaccination process in the Mediterranean Games Pavilion from Tarragona, Spain.

And you can choose. You can do nothing, and see how people are vaccinated, thanks to the random camera that shows you the flow. Or you can press a key (any key) and see how you, an experimented troll, are vaccinated.

But what you CANNOT DO is to click any key more than one time. Don't do it. You're a troll, and it will be dangerous.
